headline: Garmin (GRMN) Valuation Check After Launch Of Varia RearVue 820 Cycling Radar Tail Light
summary: Garmin (GRMN) just introduced the Varia RearVue 820, a new cycling radar tail light with advanced vehicle tracking, a brighter brake light and longer battery life, giving investors fresh information on its cycling safety lineup. See our latest analysis for Garmin. Despite the Varia RearVue 820 launch, Garmin’s recent share price performance has been subdued, with a 7 day share price return of a 1.75% decline and a year to date share price return of a 0.60% decline, while the 3 year total...

headline: ATP Flight School Begins Taking Delivery of Over 30 Aircraft in 2026
summary: ATP Flight School begins taking delivery of its 2026 aircraft orders from Piper Aircraft and Textron Aviation, with more than 30 new planes scheduled to join the fleet this year. The first being a multi-engine, Garmin G1000 NXi-equipped Piper Seminole delivered in January.

content.title: ATP Flight School Begins Taking Delivery of Over 30 Aircraft in 2026

thumbnail.caption: The Garmin G1000 NXi-equipped Piper Seminole, the first aircraft delivered as part of ATP Flight School’s 2026 aircraft orders.
